ygData.subject: RE: going linkdead
ygData.msgSnippet: I also liked the part where they said that on one of the servers they were testing Group Aggregate Damage....I have been saying this since my first kill being
ygData.messageBody:
I also liked the part where they said that on one of the servers they were
testing Group Aggregate Damage....I have been saying this since my first
kill being stolen..only makes since..Hope it comes to live servers soon..

Chrisstauf of the Lightbringers
Cleric of the 17th Circle


>From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] going linkdead
>Date: Wed, 29 Sep 1999 15:25:08 -0500
>
>From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
>This was implemented in the patch that was installed yesterday. One of our
>party members went linkdead and it said "<name> has gone linkdead." in
>bright yellow. It was our Wizard, so we knew to get the heck out!
>
>Drizben D'Vorn
>Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
>
>
> > I read on the EQ "official" website that on the test server - If a party
> > member goes link-dead, the remaining members will be notified.
>Yayayaya
> > - that is one change I would NOT mind Verant making!
> >
>
